resources.string: Pass the blob before it explodes!
Refresh the list to show nearby players
After tapping \"Start Game\" you will need to connect to another players device
Step 1: Ensure you have wifi-direct enabled on our device. If you do not, you can access the setting through the options menu in the top right and choosing \"Enable wifi-direct\"
Step 2: Press the refresh icon next to the \"Available Players\" list
Step 3: Select the player you want to play with
Step 5: The game will start after the other player accepts your request to connect
After the other player accepts the invitation to play, the game will automatically begin
Step 1: Hold your phone in landscape mode, When the blob appears on your screen push your device forward to toss the blob
Step 2: When the other player throws the blob you must catch it by thrusting your phone forward in the same motion as a throw
NOTE: you will only have a few seconds to catch the blob before it counts as a drop and you loose the game
You win the game if your opponent fails to catch the blob or if the blob explodes after our opponent catches it!
